name: ledger-map-wasm
description: WebAssembly build of ledger-map for browser usage

scripts.build:wasm: RUSTFLAGS='--cfg getrandom_backend="wasm_js"' wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir dist/wasm --features browser
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:wasm && npm run build:ts

author: decent-cloud
